title: Chesapeake & Ohio Canal National Historical Park: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                Curriculum Materials       The Chesapeake & Ohio Canal is expanding its classroom activities!   Creative and talented teachers from Allegany County, Washington County, and Montgomery County Public Schools helped to develop these lessons. All lessons and educational programs align with national and state standards.   If you are looking for a fun and educative professional development opportunity, join our curriculum team!
